segments.text: Hello , Sara are you finished packing yet ? Do you need a hand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Dad , but I can manage it myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Make sure you have your ID card . You will need it while you travel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know . The problem is that I can't find it . Where did you put it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All your important documents and certificates should be in the desk drawer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you buy a map ? Traveling can be really inconvenient without one , and you could even wind up lost
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Dad . We have a tour guide .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Also , take these pills in case you have any airsickness , and take some cold medicine , too . How about some band-aids ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I won't get sick . I promise . Ok . I've finished . Bye , Dad . See you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take care , dear ! Be careful ! Oh Sara , wait a minute ! You forget your raincoat and umbrella .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dad , that's all right . I don't think it will rain . And it doesn't make any sense to take that many things on a trip . Besides I like to travel light . Bye !
segments.speaker: S2
